scripts.build: yarn install && yarn improved-audit && yarn clean && tsc && yarn deploy-govuk-frontend
scripts.deploy-govuk-frontend: cp -r node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk dist/govuk-frontend && yarn build-govuk-css && yarn clean-govuk-dist
scripts.build-govuk-css: node-sass dist/govuk-frontend/all-ie8.scss dist/govuk-frontend/all-ie8.css && node-sass dist/govuk-frontend/all.scss dist/govuk-frontend/all.css
scripts.clean-govuk-dist: find dist/govuk-frontend -name '*.scss' -type f -delete && find dist/govuk-frontend -type d -depth -empty -exec rmdir '{}' \;
